Please use OpenDNS and remember that the IRC SERVER is irc.anonops-irc.com
The program seems to freeze when i click the hivemind mode?

There is a temporary problem with hivemind.
Use this http://files.hl2forums.com/uploads/1e55b2e_JS_LOIC_v0_1.htm

There are stability issues due to counter strikes.
Current hives:
 117.135.137.126
 irc.anonops.eu
 thealps.anonops-irc.com

If you get the stupid soccer player, the server is down/not responding.

Or you have a space before or after server name.
Like this [irc.server.name ] or [ irc.server.name]

Here are some great instructions to help you to get started with LOIC:

http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/3783/4d00a959a6a17hive.png

Only problem is that (as mentioned in the above comments) you need to type in a different "IRC server" than the one pictured. 

The only IRC server I have gotten to work correctly was: 91.121.92.84

As long as you select "FUCKING HIVE MODE" then you will remain anonymous and safe.
